name: My old man!
description:
A, D - MOVE             SPACE - JUMP

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game I made in 2017 with my father to joke around with each other, the sounds you can hear are recordings I made of my father, this game it's just a joke and was made in 1/2 hour,  so don' t expect much and have fun like when we were making this game.

I used Construct 2 to develop.

Enjoy!! :p

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Background music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VEyDNTLlRgU
developers: Luís Felipe de  Ávila e Silva
